creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Large Hanging of brick-colored satin embroidered with five-clawed dragons and Buddhist smbols in gold; clouds, bats, and Eternal Sea in satin stitch in colors. At each end a large fish rising from the waves sends out a spray of some substance from which emerges a small temple. Hanging made up of gored strips. Lining of yellow cotton.
title: Large Hanging
